lines.text: Okay. As you turn the corner, part of your cloak seems to have caught the edge of one of the pots that was layered on the table right here. As you pull through, pots start clattering. You guys watch as this whole stack of pots start pulling off into the kitchen. The door here swings open and both of these figures come rushing in. "Hey, what the hell!" They both pull out blades.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I drop it. We're in, go! I walk into the building.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll initiative, you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The rogue blew it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The rogue did blow it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not what I expected.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't die!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. 25 to 20?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, 28.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did the sound of clattering pans clatter outside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Did we hear it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did the people outside hear it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because the door was open, and it did fill what was normally a pretty still evening. That brings us to them. All right. That brings us to 20 to 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, all right. Nott... all right. 15 to ten?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, who was a 12? You?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, I think that's everyone. Top of the combat round at this moment. Beau, you're up first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hearing this noise, you are on the wall at this point keeping an eye. You guys would probably be at angles here if you maintained patrol and tried to case both sides.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to look at the window. Do I see that figure I just saw? Does it seem like the pots and pans got that figure's attention and they're hastily moving?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw them move casually past one window and then move quicker past the other.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, where am I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're over here, on the wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have been on the wall this whole time, so you're right over here. Essentially about that high.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I am going to-- do I try and make a distraction or run?

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Good question.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to light one of those firecrackers again, and I'm going to toss it this direction towards the front of the door.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and make a dexterity check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where directly do you want to aim it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to try and aim it to where it sounds like there's a commotion happening at this front door to draw people this way and not at the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to take a second for it to go off, but it definitely seems to have rolled passed and over in the vicinity just past that corner.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm assuming that was my action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was your action, and I'll say bonus action to pull it out, light it and throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to use my movement to just haul ass towards these guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Along the wall?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. (counting) That's about as far as you can get right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending your turn. Caleb you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I slap my hand down on Keg's shoulder and I, with a free hand, stick licorice root into my mouth and start chewing and squeeze her shoulder and you are Hasted. And I will-- a couple of things, and I can't find my card right now, but you have a plus two to your AC, you have advantage on dexterity saving throws, and an additional action on each of your turns.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can have four attacks in a single round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are very fast right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And your movement is twice as much. So you have 50 feet a turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start moving into the building, as far as I can, actually. Behind Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll put this on Keg as a reminder. So you move in (counting) right there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: By the doorway? Yeah, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that finishes your go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pressing into the wall there, so that people can get by me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. One of them shouts, "We got company!" over his shoulder, behind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A natural 19 on the dice. Going to move in here, this one is going to move in as well. They are probably going to move right there. They're both going to make attacks on Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first one is going to be a 13 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Miss!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You duck out of the way. You see the short sword they pull spark across the stone, carving down the side. No impact. The other one uses that moment to try and swing at you. That's equally terrible! That's far worse, actually. That's a six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nila, you're up first.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Should I put my spirit totem now to give us extra strength?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's up to you.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: It will only get within 30 feet around, so Beau would not be covered.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm coming into you, though. I'm coming into you guys.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: So when she moves into that-- Nila wants to go inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You move inside. (counting)

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: As close as I can get toward the trapdoor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, 30. You can get right into that doorway right there.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Then can I take my shillelagh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, you cannot get close enough to hit them physically. You're too far away from the combat.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Wait. Within ten feet of one of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Poison Spray.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Poison Spray. Yeah, that one creatures does, has a ten feet range. Okay. It makes a constitution saving throw. That is a failure with a natural five, so roll damage on that. It is a 2d12, right? Plus 1d12. Does this damage increase as you level up?

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: I think so. I wasn't sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A lot of cantrips do. Yes, it does, so roll 2d12.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: One. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 points of poison damage to the one on the left there. All of a sudden, as Nila rounds the corner, extending your hand, this sudden plume of dark purplish-black gas emanates around their face. They begin coughing horribly as it stings the inside of their lungs and throat. That finishes your turn? That brings us to Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh Jesus. I will bonus action disengage, and run through the door that the spider told me to go through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The closed one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you go to that door. It's locked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Locked? Great, I'll go through the other door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use your action to try and fast pick it, if you like. It's up to you. Because you can do that as a rogue.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, I'll do that. I'll fast pick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pick fast. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? It holds tight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. I have any more movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have currently 20 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will run into the next room, as far as I can get.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) That puts you right there. That ends your go. It is now Clay's turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, did she give me any bonuses? No, right? Did you do your order of the totem thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she did not do her totem.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah man. I guess I'm going to take 60 feet of running to find out what that commotion is on the other--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're about there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, would I have gone for the front door or-- No, I would have gone for the back. That's what I got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending your go; Keg, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because I'm hasted, can I get right in front of Nila?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) Yeah, easily. Whoa, you dart past. Nila's standing there--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's got another ten feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both there, right in your face, and they watch as you emerge. They don't even have time to process what you are. You're just a shape and anger, and they're like, "Whoa!" What do you want to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to smack the poisoned one with my battleaxe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it. First attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 17 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, roll damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, and then 1d8 plus four. That's eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage. (smack) He looks hurt, like between the poison gas and that he's hurt. He's not down yet, but he's looking rough.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That will be 15 plus seven. I can't do math.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 plus seven? Yeah, 25, that hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Then that is 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is on the ground, not moving. His friend just sees it, goes, "What?!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Then I have another action. I'm going to smack him, the friend that's still there. 11?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still have your bonus action if you wanted to do a fourth attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do want to do a fourth attack. I'm going to try again. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12. Unfortunately, he just manages to duck twice. The second time actually gleans off the shoulder, but the armor's too thick. No impact.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should I do action surge?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No! Tell her nothing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to use action surge, I guess. No, I'm not. I have a little bit more movement, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have ten feet of movement, yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I get between him and Nott?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move (counting). You can't quite get between the two of them, but you can be wedged into the doorway. If they try to move away from you, you will get an attack of opportunity if you want to take one as a reaction.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Back at the top. Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Have I heard my cherry bomb go off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not quite yet, because it's on an initiative of 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, what? Amazing. Okay. I'm going to move my full speed, my 40 feet. Does it get me in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an acrobatics check to leap off the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14, that's enough. You get right to the kitchen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just at the door. That's your full movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to use-- no. I'm going to use my action to move again, to dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope, I'm going to go that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I don't want to peek around the wall; I want to ninja dash around, and I want to get up against the wall, peek, and look for anyone who might be coming around that hall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, gotcha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As I ran by, I went: Psst! To Caleb, to let him know that I was here and going that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance over just to see this quick flash of Beau disappearing down the hallway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Blue fabric?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Watch for me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I should be able to see just over or under Nila's legs or something, that one last asshole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to do a fastball special, a Fire Bolt, at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this Phil, or is this his friend?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh yeah, did we kill Phil?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Phil's the one standing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughs) Sorry, Phil.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Leave him alive! He must live!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 15 to hit Phil.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These guys are human?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to hit Phil, that hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, gut!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These guys are humans?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them was human, one looked to be half-elf. Phil is the half-elf. You see this younger looking guy--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (gasps) I rolled a ten. Out of ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whoosh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So ten, plus?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it, it's just a cantrip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, cantrip, at 5th-level, it does 2d10.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Cantrips get better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. 13 points of damage. You feel the sudden burst of warm air up under your outfit for a moment, Nila, as this fire bolt goes firing through from between your legs and explodes into the chest of the guard in front of you. (yells) Backs up, and the flames lick up the front of his armor before he pats them out for a second. That finish your turn, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finishing Caleb's go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah, no. I'm going to back up ten feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's right there. Knock the chair over as you back up. At this point, you guys all hear, echoing off in the distance, (popping). Small firecrackers are now exploding on the outside of the front fortress (popping).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's hope this works the way I have in my head.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Yes! Blow them up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, as you were looking off, you see a shape run past and start heading for the door. You see--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Running past where? Oh, there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Past this way, you see a figure make their way to the door, and put their back to it. They haven't noticed you yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As they put their back to the door, focusing on where the sound of those fireworks go off, looks back through the doorway, into the middle of the mess hall, hears this commotion and looks right to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, sees me or doesn't see me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The weapon that Yasha had on her--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, that's her turn. That brings us to Nila. You're up.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Okay. I want to get to the trapdoor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you do, mom?

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Yes. I would like to move. Oh wait, he's not dead yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is not. You can just barely see another individual who appears to be joining the fray across the way. One of the slavers that is responsible for taking your family.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucking slavers.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Okay. I'd like to move forward and finish off Phil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mother's vengeance. Fuck you, Phil!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going Poison Spray, or you going--

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: I'm going to use the shillelagh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You step in--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) I can feel it coming in the air tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (synth drums)

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: This is for my son, Asar!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Swing for the attack. Actually, you could, if you wanted to, I'll allow you to move in to flank with Keg. That'll give you advantage on the attack roll.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Oh, thank you. 12 plus--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You get to roll one more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus seven, so that would be 18. So roll one more time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll take the 18. So that hits. Go ahead and roll damage. That's a d8 plus four.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Ten points of damage. You rush in (whack!), as you clock Phil on the side of his head, it slams him against the stone wall. He's like, "Ugh!" His eyes rolling within his skull. He looks pretty heavily beaned. Still conscious, but pretty badly beat up at this point. That finish your turn?

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: No. Now I would like to place my spirit totem. I want to do it as close to the trapdoor as I can to hopefully protect as many people inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no visual, unfortunately, because this door is still closed and locked. All you can see is what's in this room, this kitchen, and this chamber here. You have no visual on the trapdoor.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: But I know it's there. I know it's there from when I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know where it is, yes.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: I feel like I-- Yes, I'm going to do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Redrum.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whatever you want, Sumalee!

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: I don't know!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm being a nerd. Have fun!

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Yes, okay. I place my Bear Spirit Totem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're taking the totem.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: This will protect anyone who comes within 30 feet of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the next minute, yes.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Oh gosh. All right. Okay, she grabs her smell bag real quick. Hold on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your choice.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: I'm going to save it until next time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Since I actually skipped over Phil's turn, Phil's going to, out of retribution for the attack, swing towards you, Nila, having had no luck against you, and having not even wanting to touch this weird dwarven blur that's just destroyed his friend. He's going to swing towards you with the blade. That's going to be a 14? What's your armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy. Me against a barbarian? Has she turned to--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Run for sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To see me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. Stab and disengage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She has noticed you, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She used her turn to move and dash, so had no action yet. But went up against the front door, hearing the sound from outside, and then turned and just focused on you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck. I will-- Keg is what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keg is right there to the bad guy. Am I mistaken?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, fuck that guy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I mean, sneak attack damage--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to disable the giant, larger threat than Phil, which probably won't work, but it's worth a shot. I will point at the barbarian and say: Oi, I'm thinking of removing my spine because it's only holding me back! I will cast Hideous Laughter on the giant thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 wisdom saving throw. That's a natural six. Falls prone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She's prone!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I took out the barbarian, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, she's prone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't even see the miniature beyond the door. I didn't know she was there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She falls cackling to the ground. (laughter) and is rolling on the ground, the blade falling out of her grip for the moment and then she clutches it back to her, rolls with it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, she has it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tight tight tight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to get out of there, run past the laughing thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As fast as I can. Oh, not that way, the other way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fine. (counting)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Do I try to get her weapon or do I keep running? She's clutching it, still, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it'd be like a strength check. I'm just going to keep running. Another 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which direction? Around here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Well, because I'm still trying to get where the spider told me to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) There you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As Nott comes around the corner, I'm just going to go: Hey! Psst!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Huh? Ah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shushing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Nott's go. Clay, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Another 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you jumping off the wall or going full square on the outer wall?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll jump off the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an acrobatics check to try and land.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh, that's 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? Okay, you fall to one knee, but you get up okay. You don't take any damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's just that good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) 30. You're just coming up on the outside of the kitchen. The horse is just (snorting).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, big guy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Hey, big guy!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This guy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How could you be angry at a horse, man? It's not like this is an evil horse.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's Jeff Bridges in The Big Lebowski.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not that far off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Clay's turn. Keg, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm still Hasted, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, great. So I'm going to smack Phil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That is 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 definitely hits.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And nine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of damage?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Phil is down. Whack up the side of the head. Phil just crumples to the ground.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry, Phil! I'm going to run. Can I catch up to Nott?

lines.name: LIAM, ASHLEY
lines.text: 50 feet of movement.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 50 feet of movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you see where I went?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bing bang bong bing bong bing bong!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) You have ten more feet. You can't quite get to Nott, but there's a laughing barbarian on the ground.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I could dash, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's on the ground, though, and she is out of it so you could fucking Goodfellas the shit out of that woman.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or whatever. Whatever you want.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Yeah yeah yeah. Oh, I feel bad! I was kind of friends with her back in the day. Okay, we'll do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the dwarf moves into there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I teabag her for roughly 15 minutes and then I-- hastily. All right, here we go. Fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think you may get advantage because she's prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's advantage on the attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, okay, great. 11.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is her AC down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. The first attack, you go to swing and she rolls over from the laughter and just hit the ground. The stone cracks from the impact.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I have two more actions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then you have your extra attack, and then you have a bonus attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm Hasted, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's how you have an additional attack. So you have two more attacks.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Try again. So 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 definitely hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Still advantage on the attack, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll again in case you crit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, no, 20, and then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll damage on that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it an auto--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She makes a saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean is it advantage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is advantage, but it's not an auto crit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is the DC? She rolled a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that spell has faded.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no. But you can still attack one more time, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's still prone and you get another attack, if you like.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get that motherfucker. Get it get it, girl, get it get it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't get advantage anymore, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have advantage, she's still prone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, she's still prone, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Barbarian, 14?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 does not hit. It misses by one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those dice are terrible!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry. However, you are just a frightening display in front of her.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Now I'm going to action surge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh! Yaaas, girl, yaaas!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shit! All right, 17!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh my god, Jesus Christ almighty. 11 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage, all right. You have one more attack from the action surge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Another one?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh fuck yes, okay. Come on, baby. 20! (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It took six attacks!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So what happens when I crit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll your dice and double it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Double the dice. So then that's five--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's ten. Ten plus your modifier.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ten plus my mod-- 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But then I roll--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is it normally?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A 1d8 plus four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That, I believe, is all you can do on your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have a little bit more--?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I've got ten more feet of movement? (laughing) Okay, I'm going to try to get away from her. I'm going to go--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Zip!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know I'm going to go back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Love it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She does get an attack of opportunity on you, swinging from the ground towards you. She is prone so she has disadvantage on the attack roll, but she's going to try. That's going to be 14?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, doesn't hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It clangs against the back of your armor and you manage to get out of the way.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round is Beau!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, where's Nott? Nott's over here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott's right there on the other side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to run around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I fire three crossbow bolts.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was my 40 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, 40 feet sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have 40. No, I'm getting to Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, that's your 40 feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go-- (laughing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey girl!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the way, in the background still (fireworks exploding).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have you been treating Caleb well?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Do you need to get to the thing? To pick the lock?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah I think it's around that way? I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay! I think I know where it is. I scoop up Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yells)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you're not quite against-- you're ten feet from Nott right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Slap fight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your full movement. You have to use a dash action if you wanted to try and you move at half speed carrying Nott.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's nobody to attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have free will and I could follow you. Just say, "Follow me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or I could just scoop you up and drag you a little bit and go that direction!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do that! I'm going to dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You dash. That's five--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come here!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yells)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) There you go. So you get Nott about there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to spend-- do I want to do this? Yeah, I'm going to spend a ki point to do that thing that makes me move fast. Step of the Wind, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cocaine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) You manage to drag Nott to the door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I open the door? Is there enough room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's locked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Locked. Okay, it's through this door, though!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you know?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because I ran by it earlier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I remember from Nila describing it. I took really detailed notes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, my turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh jeez louise. Okay, I'm going to move forward, back towards where I see Nila in there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's as far as I can go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you can go two more steps if you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go towards Keg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, and I may do nothing, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Damn, this new iPad is eating it on the music.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What happened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think it's just slow. The old one disappeared and I have to get a new one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Disappeared, like was stolen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can't find the bag. It's fine. Don't worry about it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: DM, can I dance back and forth like this and see what I can see through that doorway? Can I see this one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you wanted to go there as opposed to there, I'll let you stand there. You can just barely see somebody on the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh look, there's somebody laughing and giggling on the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No longer laughing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fire Bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it, roll for the attack with disadvantage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Big money!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately strikes the stone ground and bursts into fire. No effect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Done and done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second attack is a natural 19 plus seven. So yeah, she hits you with both. First one's a crit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Jesus Christ all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's cocked. That is going to be 12 points of slashing damage for the first hit. The greatsword ends up striking across your chest, the impact sending you back and Haste disappears.

lines.name: ASHLEY, MARISHA, SUMALEE
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, why? What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because she has Yasha's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She has Yasha's sword and dispelled it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (gasps) You motherfucker, Matthew Mercer. We will have words about the rules that exist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then swings back with a second strike towards you and impacts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be 13 points of slashing damage. The second strike against you with the greatsword, the flash of white energy, you see the runes on the hilt suddenly spark and that adrenaline in your body suddenly fades and your body becomes super lethargic and you are stunned for your next turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm stunned?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Haste has faded and your body is drained.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's dispelled, but the stun still happens?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as Haste ends, your body--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's some bullshit, Matthew.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's how it works, that's the downside of the spell, man!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whatever you say, but still that's some bullshit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I just can't do anything on my next turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next turn you can't do anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's wasted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nila, you're up.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh man, I'm going to get rocked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: That's what I'm thinking. I'm thinking yes, the wizard will protect Keg.

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: I've got to go toward the trapdoor. Can I go through that door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's locked.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: I don't have the strength to (grunts)?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check. Roll a d20 and roll your strength modifier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on firbolg!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus?

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Two!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus two? 19? You force your shoulder against it and it doesn't give. The feeling and the sensation of knowing your family is nearby surges in your body and you pull back a few more steps and then charge in. With one aggressive (yells), the door flips open. The actual handle itself breaking and snapping on the wood.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's like a mom lifting a car.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially. With a 19, that's exactly what it is. That door is now open and you step through and join the rest of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yells)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, Nott, no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yelling) Do you know Pumat Sol? (laughter)

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Can I still cast or can I do a bonus thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do a bonus action thing, yes, but your action has been used to break through the door.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Okay. Now I'm going to protect the three of us, at least the three of us for now. Unless I get Caleb too with the bear spirit totem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could drop it there. As a matter of fact, everybody except for Keg and Clay.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Ten extra hit points, advantage on strength checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten temporary hit points.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Temporary hit points, advantage on strength and saving throws.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it anybody who steps into that field now, or is it just whoever's in the field when it drops?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Advantage on strength and what?

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Saving throws.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On all saving throws?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When the spirit appears, so you guys do not get it, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so you're still fucked. Goddamn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So ten temporary hit points to Caleb, Nila, Nott, and Beau for the next minute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The hit points are phenomenal.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: I could've done the hawk because of what happened with Molly I--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, this is great. You're great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Nila's turn. Nott you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try and pick this-- is the door locked? Did we try the door? Did you try the door?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door is locked, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I will Mage Hand pick the lock as a bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Terrible, 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Mage Hand doesn't have the delicate touch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have such bad luck with this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know. Action! I will also try to pick the lock. Worse.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh no! Come on!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is how Molly died! You trying to pick locks!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know! I don't know what's wrong with me!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe if we offer Taliesin's new character in exchange for our lives, we can get out of this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No one's gotten attached to him yet, right?

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: I have! Nila has!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I kind of have, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can roll another one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know you want to roll a halfling sorcerer, come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's your action and your bonus action.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm attached, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's all I can do, right? I can just move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah you can move, if you wish to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's nowhere to move, so I'll hang out by the door, maybe try to tuck behind someone bigger than me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Clay, it's you and the horses. What are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run in the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, that's what I see? There's an open door. I'm going to the open door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just destroyed the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30. You're so big, this was not designed for his firbolg form.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your movement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't see anything. I'm going to keep running.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) You walk into this chamber and you see everybody else. You also see this weird spectral bear spirit that seems to have apparated in the center of this hallway that looks at you and goes (bear growls).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey. Can I see the barbarian through the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can! You glance over and take in the scene. That's your movement and your action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I only have a bonus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hold on. I'm learning how this works. I can cast Healing Word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Phil?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah! No, on you, of course. I see that this is going down and I'm going to cast a quick Healing Word. That's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A d4 plus your wisdom modifier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 1d4 plus my wisdom modifier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A cleric who likes to heal? This is amazing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six points immediately to you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, thank you.

lines.name: LIAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep, that's everything I've got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keg, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well. Oh, I can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't do anything because you're stunned.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm stunned! Fuck, I forgot. Never mind!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the end of your turn. Top of the round, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! Okay, it's me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Welcome back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit! What's the quickest way through? Can I get through everybody and go this way? Yeah, I'm going to do that. Excuse, me. Sorry. Pardon me. Excuse me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still 15 feet from Wohn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, can I step back a few feet? I don't want to go that full movement, maybe on top of the table. Can I get on top of the table?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to be on there instead, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cool. I want to gauge it right over Keg's shoulders and throw two darts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you're going to attempt to ricochet off of her armor. Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Over top of her shoulders to the giant barbarian behind her? Hopefully?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or ricochet, whatever's the coolest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm just embellishing for fun. Why not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see if it works.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, first one: 17?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 hits. Actually, you have an advantage, technically, because she was doing reckless attacks last turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 13 on the higher one. That's a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. First one hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do these do? These do a d8 damage? These do monk or do these--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: These are the-- no, these still do 1d4, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are still darts, they're modified darts. You would need to get daggers or things that are considered monk weapons to do additional damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So the first one is crap. That's five damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five damage. Second one, with advantage still.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My second one. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, that's better. Eight damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five and eight. As you're there, getting your brain back in the space and the strength returns to you. You look up at the time the barbarian is pulling back for another round of blows, the giant blade still crimson with your own blood. These two serrated blade-like discs into her chest from over your shoulders. You glance over quickly and see Beau waving to you through the doorway.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't need to say it, but Keg is aroused.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Lady boner!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just give a wink.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Clang! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow. I have a joke, I'm going to keep it in my head. This is all going much worse than I intended it to, so I am going to tug on the glove and I'm going to slap it and send out three--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that the fly?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking fly!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scorching Ray, three times on the barbarian. First one is shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's advantage on melee attacks, not ranged attacks, but it's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second is a 15. First is total shit, second is a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Third is better than that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So two hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is eight for the first and eight for the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice! Oof. That'll be enough. How do you want to do this, Caleb?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have had very bad luck with people's skulls, so I am going to send the fire into her thighs and legs and burn the bottom of her torso and even the center of her being, her stomach, and make it burn in upon itself and harden in blackened crust.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Need you to make a wisdom saving throw, Caleb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wisdom saving-- oh, because fire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. You take a moment, and push through, and keep your wits about you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the first time I did that. First time I did not go into a state.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (breathing heavily)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau turns around to Caleb and goes: Damn, Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The firecrackers have ended. Silence comes over the fortress.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nobody else is coming?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: None that you see or hear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stay alert. We're not done here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go back to lock-a-pickin'?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to walk over to you and give you some healing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, you are the best!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: DC is getting higher with each.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Total of 15?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not going through. This is a very intricate lock. It's obviously protecting a lot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nila, I need you!

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Can I muscle my way through?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check, if you want to. You still have advantage on the strength checks because you're a bear for the time being.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do it! Yes! Okay, one more. Do a second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll it one more time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's better?

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door is too strong. This one is actually reinforced and seems to-- knowing what it's hiding-- designed to be the strongest door on this floor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott, wait for me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 12 points to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come, quickly!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I follow too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone stand back! Caleb's going to do a thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to watch this front door and make sure no one else comes down the steps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (stammering) Get the sword!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, the sword? I'll grab the sword, then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, get the sword. Sword in the haversack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grab the sword. You pull the sheath off her back and slip it in the haversack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything else worth checking?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Attune to the sword.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm putting it in the haversack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Before I leave, could I investigate--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's Yasha's sword.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: --to see if I see anything else worth taking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you'd like to. It takes a moment for you to rifle through her stuff.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll do that. What is that check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find another pouch that is a bunch of dried meats that have been salted and smoked, like a jerky. You also find another pack that has teeth in it. Just a collection of teeth. Different sizes, different ages.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No keys or anything like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No keys.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start walking to any of the dead bodies and-- or the unconscious people who are not technically dead yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've bled out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, they bled out? All right, I'm going to start using Thaumaturgy to start cooking them away in a big pile of mold and mushrooms.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh! What the fuck is wrong with you?

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: He's just returning the bodies to their natural state.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aw, it's nice to have someone who really understands. It's the process.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: I understand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will find Nott. Have you done everything that you could here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry I couldn't get it open. I tried, and I made noise, and I should've drunk more, is what I should've done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We all should've drunk more. It is no shame on you. I place my hand on the trapdoor--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not on the trapdoor, the door that leads into it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The door is locked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door is locked, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I place my hand on the door and I cast Knock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (click, creaking) The door opens.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's so amazing!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pretty good, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to walk through and find that trapdoor that I've already seen through Frumpkin's eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You go to the trapdoor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it open? You want me to check it for traps?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'll go check it for traps. That's a 28. No, 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26? It is trapped.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a trap!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the underside of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I back up about 15 feet out of this little cubby.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: From the underside.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: So if we open it, it will--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It'll hurt them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Back up everybody, out of the room, and I'll reach my mage hand around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A reach around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait for the explosion!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What am I rolling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is still another thieves' tools check, so still plus seven.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. 22 this time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22. That'll do it.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Explosion!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your mother watches this show, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The trapdoor opens, and there is a staircase that descends to a lower floor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: See? Just easy as that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it open?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's open. Let's go in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Open it. No. I hold up Frumpkin, I place him on the edge of the trapdoor, and send him scrambling under to look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a perception check for Frumpkin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still watching this front area.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? Okay. Frumpkin descends slowly down the stairs. There's a faint bit of torchlight in there. You hear whimpering. A few voices faintly whimpering. Inside the chamber-- I can show you, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what? No, you had the upstairs built, Matt, you didn't have the downstairs built. That would be too much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys? D&D Beyond.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We learned so much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've learned so much about-- Hey Taliesin, welcome back to the show!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, it's great to be back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Will you show off your shirt? It's a little squishy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a little squishy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "New character, who dis?" Aw, that's great!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Last week, Taliesin was hanging like Tom Cruise in a Mission: Impossible movie just above the table waiting to drop in, and we all thought it would happen near the end of the episode, but it didn't. It didn't. How does it feel to finally let that little bit of rope cut and be in the game again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got to say, it's been a little nerve wracking coming in as someone new. It's very interesting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I like this guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like this guy, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I like this guy a lot.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's awesome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: His voice is sexy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He had such a great intro.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I like pink more than purple, if I can say.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like it all, so I'm a fan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you really like pink more than purple? Like, as a person?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't tell if you're lying to me or not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I like pink a little more than purple.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was a very good mohawk. It was black-light reactive.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Matt's back!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So hi guys. Frumpkin slowly descends the staircase, and you can see a rack that is bolted into the wall that has chains hanging from it, a few other sets of manacles, a few torture implements: long metal things that are hooked at the end, brands. There are a few spaces that are currently empty where tools probably would normally hang, and there is another door that leads to a chamber beyond, and that's where you hear the whimpering coming from.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What I don't like about this is that the asshole was sleeping upstairs and we don't know about that at all, but I send Frumpkin along the ceiling and through-- that looks like a barred gate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Frumpkin looks within, you can see another chamber. You can see another hired figure, at least the same cloaked individuals you had encountered before, same attire, who is currently sitting at the back, up against the wall, and is looking in the direction of the door expectantly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will attempt to send Frumpkin over his head along the ceiling stealthily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check for Frumpkin. Frumpkin also noticed there is a cage in the corner that contains two figures in there. Looks to be two humanoid figures.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Humanoid, that's it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that perception roll and the low light, it's hard to tell. One appears to be larger, one appears to be smaller.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha and Jester,

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to keep going and you said roll--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Very good, that is a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Unnoticing, he sits there waiting, arm against the wall. Frumpkin slowly makes his way through this hallway. It bends off on a corner around the side. Frumpkin continues beyond and it curves around another corner here. There is an archway that leads into another room that has two more cages that contain-- each cage contains another figure. The figures in there appear to be slumped down and either unconscious or sleeping.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, he pauses, he's looking for green or blue or goth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Ruzza and Protto, two more members of The Iron Shepherds that are currently waiting there with their eyes towards the entryway expectantly. It seems that they have been notified of your presence.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know, maybe the loud firecrackers going off right above?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do they do, those two? What do those two do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're bad. One's a magic person.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So would Frumpkin be at the edge of that gate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frumpkin would be here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 19 last we checked and that was 20 seconds ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As they're both standing there waiting, Protto, the little halfling sharpshooter creep, glances up and goes, takes his shortbow and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I see this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pulls it off his shoulder. Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (popping)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's the last you see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There are more people down there. This is the x-factor we spoke about.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I saw two down there, correct?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Three, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One in that chamber and then two in there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, but I mean in that last room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In that last room it was two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I did not see Lazlo, so he could be upstairs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lorenzo.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't see el boogie down there so he could be upstairs or downstairs, is what I'm saying.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But then you saw some prisoners?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Dwelma's dead, we just beat the barbarian, Protto and Ruzza are down there, that means Lorenzo is upstairs, unless he's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or somewhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We do not know that. We know that there is one random shithead and two more beyond that, and I did not see Lorenzo or Lazlo or Larkin.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Lorenzo.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So he's either still upstairs or deeper, further.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, he's either behind us or down below.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or he's not here at all and he's at the bar that he likes to hang out at--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Trench.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Called The Trench. Fuck you. So close, I was almost there.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: What about prisoners?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, there were some people in cages, but I did not get a good look at them through my spider's eyes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't close this door that Nila just exploded, but we can put up some sort of person to watch so some of us can go down there and snoop around and maybe kill that one guard that you spotted.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here is what I think: We have a bit of a bottleneck here at this trapdoor. If they want to come up they have to deal with us, ja?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So if the majority of us wait at this trap door and I send my spider upstairs to see what's going on, to see if our friend is up there, we can learn about upstairs, and if anyone pokes their head out of that door they're going to lose it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That seems like a good plan to me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's keep figuring things out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So are you sending Frumpkin upstairs?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any ideas, Mr. Clay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I mean, could just ask him to open the door. The ruckus has stopped and obviously, somebody won this fight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have the trapdoor open though, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But the gate down there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can do that if you like.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How about, everyone get ready?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Close it quietly, and if anyone has a look around--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can just go down and ask. I was going to mention, I do look like a guard right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You do. So do I. We still look like guards.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm grabbing a little muck, putting it on my face, getting all-- I could just go down if you like.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why don't we bring this guard up here to us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But, well, you are putting a lot on the line for people you've just met tonight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why don't we handle this guard first, and I go, here, lift up the gate. Lift up the trapdoor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't want to bring him up? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you go ahead and descend the stairs into this chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Simultaneously, Caleb will slap his hand down on Keg's shoulder and send Frumpkin on the ceiling or on the first floor, towards the stairwell at the front of the building.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go down with Clay, but just at the stairs, since I also look like a guard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you stay at the stairs there, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you glance through, Clay, you can see the faint light in here, you can see the figure's walking up to the cage, eyes still trained on the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just tapping on the doors. All clear. We got one, it's Keg. We'll handle it. I'm going to head back upstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he have advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It's allowing him to do one--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's cocked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was cocked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I saw it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start heading back up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, I'll get back to work."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could use your help up here if you got a second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I tap on the bars with my staff, and I go: Wait man, Phil, there's something wrong with Phil, I think he really needs our help. Fucking Phil, am I right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll fucking high, Marisha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not gambling for torturing children.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fucking Phil.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Phil, am I right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pulls back. You can see there's a heated spike that's orange at the tip that he pulls out of the cage. He goes (growling).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to head upstairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hate it when Phil ruins torturing hour.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He steps back towards the table at the back and sets it down there, where you can see there are other implements laid out. He comes back to the cage and goes, "I'll be back later," and comes to the door where you are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I step to the side, let him unlock the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm heading up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Opens the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As I head up through the trapdoor, I'm like, get ready everyone, just when he comes up, and just walking a little way past.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go: Just follow him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Steps up the stairs, makes it up through the hatch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everybody--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everybody, make an ambush round. He was not expecting that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is not here; he is in the spider.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First, you celebrate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, shit. Is this on your Shillelagh? What are you doing with this?

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Spidering.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never done this before. 17 plus something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you all hit. What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I don't think I hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll your d8.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: d8 is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight-sided.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whack! Upside the head as he dizzies off from that point, immediately going into Keg. Roll damage on that one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six damage, and carved from the battle axe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it just a straight 1d6 plus nothing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you using?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was using the staff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a 1d8.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it's 1d8.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because it's a quarterstaff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus your strength modifier?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seven, because I have my strength modifier-- no, eight, just because I have no strength modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Crack! And then--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this a surprise?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven plus six, 13, plus-- I've been adding wrong. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that'll do it. He comes up and immediately-- and falls to the ground, barely conscious, looking up, his face bloodied and the crossbow bolt jammed into his shoulder and past the rib and he's having a hard time breathing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as Clay, hushing as he just slowly pushes his face in with his fist repeatedly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to drag him back. We got another suit, if anyone wants one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well Nila, you can disguise yourself, right?

lines.name: NILA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We could have two guards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, what are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin is still climbing towards the stairwell up and I am computing everything that our druid friend told me about the stairs to see if Big Man is asleep in his room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you coast around here--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All the maps!

lines.name: TALIESIN, LIAM
lines.text: (singing) So many maps!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make your way through, down this hall, to the bedroom where you had seen was Lorenzo's room, not present. Crawls over to the next bedroom, two beds. Not present.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I tell you what I'm going to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This fucker's not here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm at the top of these stairs. Boy, it's hard to say because the map is gone, but I think what I will do is I'll drop out of Frumpkin for a moment and I have 30 feet of movement, so I will walk 25 feet towards those stairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Toward the stairs where Frumpkin was?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, towards the second floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You're at the base, essentially, or near the staircase that leads up and out to this space there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh wow. If I'm able, I will stand on my own and go back into Frumpkin and wait because he is far ahead of me, Frumpkin, and my friends are mostly behind me, but I'm okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What's everybody else doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The gate's open.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: I want to go down.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like I want to stay with Caleb, in case.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Keg is staying up with Caleb.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is that cool with you, Caleb?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go with you, Nila.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't hear anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nila, you head down.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I'm going to stand behind you, in case.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's great.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Come join us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll come down with you, that's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I feel you next to me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, maybe I'll put my hand on you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I? If I feel the dwarf next to me, I would use a free hand to jam some licorice back into my mouth and start chewing furiously, anxiously. I'm so scared of everything. And cast Haste again, into the dwarf.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Tight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you have one minute before that spell goes away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One minute, ja. I know. You are again on methamphetamines.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Perfect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you enter this lower chamber, you come in with a fair light. You look over on the table and there are the implements there. You step out and there is a moment where you touch your foot to the ground, and something gives way. You see a cable that was run through the ground quickly whip up the air, and you glance up to see heavy netting that contains a bunch of broken brick and stone that falls down from the center of the chamber. I need both Nott and Nila to make dexterity saving throws, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're not still under the influence of any sort of thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It only lasts a-- nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11. That's a failure on your point. That is eight points of bludgeoning damage to you, four points to you, as this pile of stone fills the corner. You guys manage to step off to the side and pull yourself out of the rubble, but you get the sense now that this room is definitely trapped and there is definitely an awareness within and deeper of your presence. Nila, as you recover from this, you glance up and see the cage in the corner that you had passed when you first entered and you see a hand hanging off one of the metal bars-- a tiny, familiar hand: a bit of fur that covers and vanishing into the faint, grayish-blue tint of what is Asar's hand.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: I want to go to him, to touch him-- but I want to make sure that there's nothing that is going to trigger something else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Oh! I'm so nervous! 19?

lines.name: MATT, MARISHA
lines.text: That's cocked.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, sorry. It was almost good.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus?

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Plus my, which check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Should I use my luck point now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, your luck is dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she didn't use it last time, she saved it--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you saved it! (inhales)

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: I have to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, no! It's a one!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kid's dead, let's go home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you still pick the one you want to, so you go with the previous one. You don't have to pick the one. Pretty sure that's how the luck feat works, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's right. Whatever one you want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You come up close and look inside. You can see Kitor, your partner, is slumped in the back of the cage, unconscious. With what little bit of light is in here as you focus-- you have darkvision, so you can see in his unconscious face he is still breathing, but there are wounds and scrapes. You look and see Asar, who is awake, who is currently holding a burn puncture right in his abdomen. He looks up to you, the sweat dripping down his face, and goes, "Mama? Mama!" and leans up to the cage and puts his hand over the outside of the bar and reaches out for you with the other hand and entwines his fingers. "Mama, you came."

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: I'm here. Mama's here. I want to heal them. Can I heal them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you have a heal spell, yeah.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: I have Healing Word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (quietly) I don't like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your healing word to your son?

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: (quickly reading under breath)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the word you say that heals him?

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Oh, what's the word I say, I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What phrase? It's up to you.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Be well. Be well, my son.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d4.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's pretty good. It's three.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Three? Did that count?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, I'll let it. It's all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus your wisdom modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking really hurt from whatever injuries he's sustained, you watch as the injuries slowly close up and he breathes a little heartier again and looks at you with a renewed smile, his hand still entwining your fingers, and says, "Mama, I want to "go home."

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: I'll bring you home. We're going to get you out of here. I grab that cage and try to pull it apart as much as I can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, make a strength check, just for the hell of it. Because life gets weird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While this is happening, can I come and watch this corridor?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to come in the corridor as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to suck up against this wall and look to make sure no one is coming around that hall while this is happening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Since I still look like a soldier, I'm going to be willing to be a little visible on the corner.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, actually, we both look like soldiers. We block this corridor, looking like soldiers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you move into the corridor?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just backs to that corridor in this room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yup, like we're watching-- guarding this room together.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Strength check, 19 plus two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You begin to (strains)-- and you watch as Nila's arms pop with the muscles filling with adrenaline and emotion as the metal bars bend ever so slightly. Just enough to maybe fit Asar through-- not your mate. You pull them just enough and you reach through and he pulls his way, and you help him grab his shoulder, and slowly you pull your son free from the cage and into your arms.
