lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: (sobs) I hug him again. I want to go, I want to run. I don't know what to do. I look inside and see if there's any way that I can pull further to get Kitor out too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your strength is waning from the physical exertion of getting even that bit of the metal open.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Can I heal him? I know he has powers to help himself out of here if I heal him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While she does that, I'll try to jimmy the bent lock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're supposed to be good at this!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Buddy...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You bent it!

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: You can't blame the mother!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for Healing Word.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just for my own giggles, I'm going to cast Detect Magic really quickly, because this place is giving me the creeps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have an auto-thing I can do apparently, which is nuts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to need a new iPad. This thing is crashing and falling apart the whole night. Great job.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to look around for keys or something. Just around the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh my god. You need to use a new one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you just roll two ones in a row?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam, we're not making money for charity. You can slow your roll here, buddy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 826LA, guys!

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Do I roll this for--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, to heal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Detect Magic as a racial trait, which apparently is a thing you can do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Firbolgs are amazing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any magic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the immediate chamber?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Focusing on this, you don't sense any immediate magical auras within the chamber.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. How about within 30 feet. Am I getting a ping?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing that you can see in the immediate area, no.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still purple from the outside, but the swelling has diminished from the healing effect of your spell, and he looks up. "My mate." He looks down at his hands and looks out and sees that Asar's been freed, and he looks out at the strange crew-- looks towards both of you and (gasps).

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: It's okay, they're safe. They came to help. Can you get out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Help me."

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: How? Tell me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That puts it over 20. Both of you together (strains), and one of the bars comes off on one side. He gets in quickly and puts his shoulder in and pushes against the other, and that bends off to the side, leaving just enough room for him to push through. It takes a minute and you're helping him and grabbing his elbow, and the two of your together-- You feel something pop in his shoulder, but it's just enough to get his body to wedge out of the space, and he comes back out of it and embraces you-- the other arm limply hanging at one side, but he takes you in his hand. He looks down at his son and looks over at the rest of you, tired. Still, amongst the trauma he has suffered, there is a pride and a silent strength to him-- very much similar to that you've seen in Nila. "I do not know by what grace you've come to us, but thank you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Couldn't have done it without her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, she's quite impressive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That she is," and pets the back of your head.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now, if I was you, I'd run.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: What about your friends?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have a child with you. You need to get him out of here. He's suffered enough. We've got it from here.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We wouldn't have gotten this far without you.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Clay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: We'll go back to your temple. Will you help these people-- will you help these friends?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here, come on. Give me a hug.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Nila gives him a big hug.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it already steeped, or is that just the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's just loose leaf.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not a bag. It's just loose leaf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kitor picks up Asar and throws him over his shoulder, now standing in his full form, just below the ceiling of this chamber-- taller, even, than Clay. "Thank you. Let's go home."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See you soon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll see you later.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: They took him too, and Duma was the little one that Jumnda mentioned. One feather was for me, for leaving my tribe to find my family, and I took an extra one because I thought I would find friends who might help me. I will give it to you. I undo the feather, pull it off; it's a perfectly intact red feather. I don't know who will take it, but if you ever need our help, you can come to the temple. If, by chance, we're not there-- but only because one of us would go back to check on the others of our tribe-- we'll be in the Crispvale Thicket. Just go where the moss is the thickest, and I'll be there. Thank you for everything. Thank you so much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll find you again, Nila.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Thank you. Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good luck."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the three of them, given a second chance at life and freedom, step through the door where you entered and vanish up the stairs, the heavy footfalls dissipating as they grow further and further from you. The two of you, who have been focusing-- that point, the Haste spell having coursed into your body-- glance behind and see as the family steps through the kitchen door and exits. There's only one path left to find the others that were taken. And that's where we'll leave tonight's game.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This was the best.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Thank you guys so much!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sumalee!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sumalee!

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: You guys rock!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you for playing with us!

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: This was such an amazing experience.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One red Nila feather.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (as "The Twelve Days of Christmas") Five gold coins!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have so much murder in my eye right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love this color, by the way, that we're getting right now. That's lovely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a fun one, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was beautiful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was so amazing!

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Thank you guys for having me!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You were so much fun!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you for coming. You were amazing.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Thank you guys. This has been mindblowingly fun. It's so easy to get into with all of you guys being so-- embodying your characters so well. It just is so easy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the best game. It's the best game!

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: I had so much fun. Oh my gosh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You were the softness that we needed--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Desperately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: --in our group. Desperately.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything fits so well into place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She was the Charmin bear, and we were like... rocks? I don't know, that's all I got.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Things are really bad in the Mighty Nein when Nott is the soft member of the group.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Aw, man, we get to pick up this next phase at GenCon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to be doing this live next time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Holy moley.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is where we got to. Oh man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Exciting!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, boy, that's going to be fun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See player characters killed live in Indianapolis!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you not entertained?!

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Seriously, thank you for introducing me to this game. I mean it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You were so great.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Now I understand why people that I know play this game--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sumalee. Sam and I were talking about bullshit before the beginning of the game, and I forget the context but he was talking about you and I said, "No, she's never played. She played "one practice game before this," and Sam's brain went (explosion).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You were so great, so confident, so much great roleplaying. Amazing.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: I learned from you guys. I learned by watching you! Yeah, I played one... what do you call it, a one-off? It was a three hour one-off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With Matt?

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: No, a dear, dear friend of mine, Tom Lommel, ran-- he pulled in some friends so I would have some sense, because I didn't want to-- he was like, "Your first game is going to be on Critical "Role? You need to come over and we'll play one practice round."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you've been so great, thank you for joining us, seriously. And for bringing a character that I think all of us are absolutely in love with.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: And now there's a firbolg! I feel like leaving--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Passing the torch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Passing the torch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well. On that note, let's go ahead and close tonight's game--

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Oh, was all that-- that was all recorded?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Oh, we're still on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: I thought we were done!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, we're still going!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're still on the TV.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell us about your politics.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: I totally believed you. I was like "Oh, wait, are we?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aw. Thank you so much for joining us; you're amazing. I've been wanting to have you on for a while, so I'm glad we could make it work.

lines.name: SUMALEE
lines.text: Thank you so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Super excited for that. Until then, guys, have a wonderful week, we love you, and is it Thursday-- or Friday yet? Good night! [music]
